attributes.comment: Develop the baseline data standard using FHIR to ingest the data but provide the ability for the data providers to submit the data in whatever format to ensure that the use FHIR doesn’t prohibit the data submission by all the stakeholders.  As part of the data standard an interoperable translation engine should be developed to do the data mapping and accept the different formats of data if FHIR is not being used.  Currently this approach is being used to collect and share the Prescription Drug Monitoring related data across all 50 states.
